description.brief: Speed, agility, precision, and hand-eye coordination
description.detailed: Dexterity governs precision movement, timing, and technical execution. High Dexterity improves accuracy, evasion, and speed-based actions.
description.visual_manifestation: Arc flashes, rapid movements, green kinetic lines

primary_effects: Increases action speed and animation cancel windows
Improves hit chance and critical timing
Enhances dodge rate and positional control
Boosts finesse and ranged weapon handling
secondary_effects: Improves tool precision and crafting quality
core_mechanics.soft_caps: Diminishing returns after 60 for speed-related modifiers

damage_type_integration.damage_synergy: Lightning and reaction-based techniques scale with Dexterity
